trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_DAYLY_000_000<tab>Welcome, welcome, fair traveler! Care to test your luck with a Mini Cactpot ticket?
TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_Q1_000_000<tab>Try your hand at the Mini Cactpot?
TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_DAYLY_000_010<tab>Very well, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. But remember: with the Mini Cactpot, prosperity's but a scratch away!
TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_DAYLY_000_020<tab>Splendid, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! Now, allow me to explain: Mini Cactpot is a game of chance, available to you thrice every day.

TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_DAYLY_000_021<tab>Playing is simplicity itself: just guess the value of the covered numbers to win it big. If Nymeia's grace is with you, you'll be rewarded with Manderville Gold Saucer points galore!
TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_DAYLY_100_030<tab>You can now purchase Mini Cactpot tickets.
TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You can now purchase up to three Mini Cactpot tickets per day.

TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The counter for Mini Cactpot tickets resets daily at <var 06 01 /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).

TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>Each Mini Cactpot ticket has nine slots arranged in a three-by-three grid. Each slot is randomly assigned a number from one to nine. When you purchase a ticket, a single number will be revealed.
TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>To play, uncover any three other numbers. Based on that information, guess the sum of each line.
TEXT_SUBGSC103_00488_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Finally, select a single line. The payout of MGP will depend upon the total sum of the line you have chosen.
